hero.title: Digital Geosciences Platform
hero.subtitle: Open Research Platform Connecting Geoscience, AI, and Sustainable Development.

objectives.label: Research
points: Leveraging AI and automation in geoscientific data to enhance understanding of geological processes.
Apply data-driven insights and modeling to address complex real-world challenges.

objectives.label: Education
points: Advancing geoscience education through digital transformation and modern data management skills
Empowering students and researchers to handle every stage of the data lifecycle — from acquisition through visualization and modeling.

objectives.label: Consultations
points: Offer expert guidance on the integration, harmonization, and quality control of geoscientific data.
Work with partners to analyze and interpret complex geological datasets.
